name: The Assassins: PD Games Volume 02
description:
The Assassins: PD Games Volume 02 is the one in a series of compilations of public domain games 'developed' by The Assassins, a couple of guys from the north of England. In all they produced at least two hundred and fifty such compilations which typically contained between two and six games many of which had been featured on cover discs for the UK versions of magazines such as Amiga Power and Amiga Format. The games in this compilation were:
  • Girl Actions
  • Missile Command
  • Amoeba Invaders
  • Bally II
  • The Maze, called "Maze Game" here
  • Think Ahead

shot.caption: The game's information screen followed a virus check
This is the screen where the player made their game selection. A long message scrolls across the bottom of the screen
